publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2693 Mr Brian Monteith: British Winter Olympic Team—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the 51 members of the Great Britain team participating in the 2002 Olympic Winter Games in Salt Lake City, particularly to the 19 Scottish members who are involved in events such as skiing, curling, snowboarding and the biathlon. Supported by: David Mundell*, Mr David Davidson*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) Phil Gallie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Murdo Fraser*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) David McLetchie*, Iain Smith*

S1M-2693 Mr Brian Monteith: British Winter Olympic Team—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the 51 members of the Great Britain team participating in the 2002 Olympic Winter Games in Salt Lake City, particularly to the 19 Scottish members who are involved in events such as skiing, curling, snowboarding and the biathlon. Supported by: David Mundell, Mr David Davidson, Phil Gallie, Marilyn Livingstone, Murdo Fraser, David McLetchie, Iain Smith, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, John Scott*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) Alex Fergusson*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) Tavish Scott*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) Maureen Macmillan*, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Mary Scanlon*
S1M-2693 British Winter Olympic Team (lodged on 4 February 2002) Mr Keith Harding*
